Name: Karlsruhe
Propulsion:
2 × MAN 10-cylinder diesel engines
4 × geared steam turbines
2 screw propellers
Range: 5,700 nmi (10,600 km; 6,600 mi) at 19 knots (35 km/h; 22 mph)
Armament:
9 × 15 cm SK C/25 guns
2 × 8.8 cm SK L/45 anti-aircraft guns
12 × 50 cm torpedoes
120 mines
Armor:
Belt: 50 mm (2 in)
Deck: 40 mm (1.6 in)
Conning tower: 100 mm (3.9 in)
